QuestData.Title: Mor'Ladim
QuestData.Description: From what my scouts tell me, Mor'Ladim wanders throughout Duskwood, following a strange and meandering path through the cemetery. We buried him out past the house on the hill, you know where that is?$b$bThere isn't anything I can do to help you, but I wish you good luck.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Mor'Ladim, then return his skull to Commander Althea Ebonlocke in Darkshire.
QuestData.CompletionText: I don't blame you if you're having trouble with him, $n. Some of our strongest Watchers have been lost to Mor'Ladim.
QuestData.RewardText: You killed him? That's no small accomplishment, $n! On behalf of the people of Darkshire and the Night Watch, I thank you.$b$bAh... there is one small matter, however...
